body: Dear Chris and Mostapha  1st. thanks for everything you've done, its really amazing Tools, 2ed.  how can i create a [Agro Shade Net](http://www.diatex.com/-SHADE-NETTING,305-.html?PHPSESSID=3b47uack36ancct6g8j9o723s6) or [Plastic Film](http://www.vatanplastik.com/eng/home.asp?page=6&id=248&CatID=24&Title=Added%20Greenhouse%20Films)  to be instead of glass as glazing materials, i tried to make this materials by Honeybee_create materials component but no success. 3ed. how we can apply the shade Net and incorporated with Ventilation bcz its already have ventilation ratio since its Net.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vRWi3e17RGpnLVZX3hTdgbOfLKp1tzSX2IbOlflvfj0VJ7k3NtFAy--Xix4838qqmSXKmD06zxdeKwNxvXvJbyElEeHeIyPc/2airtempreture_.jpg) Thanks in advance rafatahmed
